Title: The Lady Vanishes
Writer: Ethel Lina White (based upon the story: "The Wheel Spins" by), Sidney Gilliat (screen play), Frank Launder (screen play)
Actors: Margaret Lockwood, Michael Redgrave, Paul Lukas, May Whitty
Plot: While traveling in continental Europe, a rich young playgirl realizes that an elderly lady seems to have disappeared from the train.
